We beat cancer by early detection!



Our Services



Screening yourself for cancer has never been easier and faster!

To get tested follow our three simple steps:





1. Ask your local GP to be screened for cancer with the MeDNA test



2. Go through a simple blood test



3. Get results from your GP in 1 day

Method



Our test detects epigenetic changes in the DNA extracted from your blood

Low levels of DNA methylation might be the first signs of cancer.

Uniqueness of our test in its generality - any possible type of cancer is detected.
